original_text: I Daniel was grieved in my spirit in the midst of my body, and the visions of my head troubled me.
korean_text: 나 다니엘이 중심에 근심하며 내 머리 속의 환상이 나를 번민하게 한지라

sentences.original_text: I Daniel was grieved in my spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 나 다니엘은 내 영 안에서 슬퍼했으며

sentences.original_text: in the midst of my body
and the visions of my head troubled me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 머리의 환상들이 나를 괴롭혔다
